00042 BlenderSession::BlenderSession(BL::RenderEngine b_engine_, BL::UserPreferences b_userpref_,
00043     BL::BlendData b_data_, BL::Scene b_scene_)
00044 : b_engine(b_engine_), b_userpref(b_userpref_), b_data(b_data_), b_scene(b_scene_),
00045   b_v3d(PointerRNA_NULL), b_rv3d(PointerRNA_NULL),
00046   b_rr(PointerRNA_NULL), b_rlay(PointerRNA_NULL)
00047 {
00048     /* offline render */
00049     BL::RenderSettings r = b_scene.render();
00050 
00051     width = (int)(r.resolution_x()*r.resolution_percentage()/100);
00052     height = (int)(r.resolution_y()*r.resolution_percentage()/100);
00053     background = true;
00054     last_redraw_time = 0.0f;
00055 
00056     create_session();
00057 }
00058 
00059 BlenderSession::BlenderSession(BL::RenderEngine b_engine_, BL::UserPreferences b_userpref_,
00060     BL::BlendData b_data_, BL::Scene b_scene_,
00061     BL::SpaceView3D b_v3d_, BL::RegionView3D b_rv3d_, int width_, int height_)
00062 : b_engine(b_engine_), b_userpref(b_userpref_), b_data(b_data_), b_scene(b_scene_),
00063   b_v3d(b_v3d_), b_rv3d(b_rv3d_), b_rr(PointerRNA_NULL), b_rlay(PointerRNA_NULL)
00064 {
00065     /* 3d view render */
00066     width = width_;
00067     height = height_;
00068     background = false;
00069     last_redraw_time = 0.0f;
00070 
00071     create_session();
00072     session->start();
00073 }
00074 
00075 BlenderSession::~BlenderSession()
00076 {
00077     free_session();
00078 }
00079 
00080 void BlenderSession::create_session()
00081 {
00082     SceneParams scene_params = BlenderSync::get_scene_params(b_scene, background);
00083     SessionParams session_params = BlenderSync::get_session_params(b_userpref, b_scene, background);
00084 
00085     /* reset status/progress */
00086     last_status= "";
00087     last_progress= -1.0f;
00088 
00089     /* create scene */
00090     scene = new Scene(scene_params);
00091 
00092     /* create sync */
00093     sync = new BlenderSync(b_data, b_scene, scene, !background);
00094     sync->sync_data(b_v3d);
00095 
00096     if(b_rv3d)
00097         sync->sync_view(b_v3d, b_rv3d, width, height);
00098     else
00099         sync->sync_camera(b_engine.camera_override(), width, height);
00100 
00101     /* create session */
00102     session = new Session(session_params);
00103     session->scene = scene;
00104     session->progress.set_update_callback(function_bind(&BlenderSession::tag_redraw, this));
00105     session->progress.set_cancel_callback(function_bind(&BlenderSession::test_cancel, this));
00106     session->set_pause(BlenderSync::get_session_pause(b_scene, background));
00107 
00108     /* set buffer parameters */
00109     BufferParams buffer_params = BlenderSync::get_buffer_params(b_scene, b_rv3d, width, height);
00110     session->reset(buffer_params, session_params.samples);
00111 }
00112 
00113 void BlenderSession::free_session()
00114 {
00115     delete sync;
00116     delete session;
00117 }
00118 
00119 static PassType get_pass_type(BL::RenderPass b_pass)
00120 {
00121     switch(b_pass.type()) {
00122         case BL::RenderPass::type_COMBINED:
00123             return PASS_COMBINED;
00124 
00125         case BL::RenderPass::type_Z:
00126             return PASS_DEPTH;
00127         case BL::RenderPass::type_NORMAL:
00128             return PASS_NORMAL;
00129         case BL::RenderPass::type_OBJECT_INDEX:
00130             return PASS_OBJECT_ID;
00131         case BL::RenderPass::type_UV:
00132             return PASS_UV;
00133         case BL::RenderPass::type_MATERIAL_INDEX:
00134             return PASS_MATERIAL_ID;
00135 
00136         case BL::RenderPass::type_DIFFUSE_DIRECT:
00137             return PASS_DIFFUSE_DIRECT;
00138         case BL::RenderPass::type_GLOSSY_DIRECT:
00139             return PASS_GLOSSY_DIRECT;
00140         case BL::RenderPass::type_TRANSMISSION_DIRECT:
00141             return PASS_TRANSMISSION_DIRECT;
00142 
00143         case BL::RenderPass::type_DIFFUSE_INDIRECT:
00144             return PASS_DIFFUSE_INDIRECT;
00145         case BL::RenderPass::type_GLOSSY_INDIRECT:
00146             return PASS_GLOSSY_INDIRECT;
00147         case BL::RenderPass::type_TRANSMISSION_INDIRECT:
00148             return PASS_TRANSMISSION_INDIRECT;
00149 
00150         case BL::RenderPass::type_DIFFUSE_COLOR:
00151             return PASS_DIFFUSE_COLOR;
00152         case BL::RenderPass::type_GLOSSY_COLOR:
00153             return PASS_GLOSSY_COLOR;
00154         case BL::RenderPass::type_TRANSMISSION_COLOR:
00155             return PASS_TRANSMISSION_COLOR;
00156 
00157         case BL::RenderPass::type_EMIT:
00158             return PASS_EMISSION;
00159         case BL::RenderPass::type_ENVIRONMENT:
00160             return PASS_BACKGROUND;
00161         case BL::RenderPass::type_AO:
00162             return PASS_AO;
00163         case BL::RenderPass::type_SHADOW:
00164             return PASS_SHADOW;
00165 
00166         case BL::RenderPass::type_DIFFUSE:
00167         case BL::RenderPass::type_COLOR:
00168         case BL::RenderPass::type_REFRACTION:
00169         case BL::RenderPass::type_SPECULAR:
00170         case BL::RenderPass::type_REFLECTION:
00171         case BL::RenderPass::type_VECTOR:
00172         case BL::RenderPass::type_MIST:
00173             return PASS_NONE;
00174     }
00175     
00176     return PASS_NONE;
00177 }
00178 
00179 void BlenderSession::render()
00180 {
00181     /* get buffer parameters */
00182     SessionParams session_params = BlenderSync::get_session_params(b_userpref, b_scene, background);
00183     BufferParams buffer_params = BlenderSync::get_buffer_params(b_scene, b_rv3d, width, height);
00184     int w = buffer_params.width, h = buffer_params.height;
00185 
00186     /* create render result */
00187     RenderResult *rrp = RE_engine_begin_result((RenderEngine*)b_engine.ptr.data, 0, 0, w, h);
00188     PointerRNA rrptr;
00189     RNA_pointer_create(NULL, &RNA_RenderResult, rrp, &rrptr);
00190     b_rr = BL::RenderResult(rrptr);
00191 
00192     BL::RenderSettings r = b_scene.render();
00193     BL::RenderResult::layers_iterator b_iter;
00194     BL::RenderLayers b_rr_layers(r.ptr);
00195     
00196     /* render each layer */
00197     for(b_rr.layers.begin(b_iter); b_iter != b_rr.layers.end(); ++b_iter) {
00198         /* set layer */
00199         b_rlay = *b_iter;
00200 
00201         /* add passes */
00202         vector<Pass> passes;
00203         Pass::add(PASS_COMBINED, passes);
00204 
00205         if(session_params.device.advanced_shading) {
00206             BL::RenderLayer::passes_iterator b_pass_iter;
00207             
00208             for(b_rlay.passes.begin(b_pass_iter); b_pass_iter != b_rlay.passes.end(); ++b_pass_iter) {
00209                 BL::RenderPass b_pass(*b_pass_iter);
00210                 PassType pass_type = get_pass_type(b_pass);
00211 
00212                 if(pass_type != PASS_NONE)
00213                     Pass::add(pass_type, passes);
00214             }
00215         }
00216 
00217         buffer_params.passes = passes;
00218         scene->film->passes = passes;
00219         scene->film->tag_update(scene);
00220 
00221         /* update session */
00222         session->reset(buffer_params, session_params.samples);
00223 
00224         /* update scene */
00225         sync->sync_data(b_v3d, b_iter->name().c_str());
00226 
00227         /* render */
00228         session->start();
00229         session->wait();
00230 
00231         if(session->progress.get_cancel())
00232             break;
00233 
00234         /* write result */
00235         write_render_result();
00236     }
00237 
00238     /* delete render result */
00239     RE_engine_end_result((RenderEngine*)b_engine.ptr.data, (RenderResult*)b_rr.ptr.data);
00240 }
00241 
00242 void BlenderSession::write_render_result()
00243 {
00244     /* get state */
00245     RenderBuffers *buffers = session->buffers;
00246 
00247     /* copy data from device */
00248     if(!buffers->copy_from_device())
00249         return;
00250 
00251     BufferParams& params = buffers->params;
00252     float exposure = scene->film->exposure;
00253     double total_time, sample_time;
00254     int sample;
00255 
00256     session->progress.get_sample(sample, total_time, sample_time);
00257 
00258     vector<float> pixels(params.width*params.height*4);
00259 
00260     /* copy each pass */
00261     BL::RenderLayer::passes_iterator b_iter;
00262     
00263     for(b_rlay.passes.begin(b_iter); b_iter != b_rlay.passes.end(); ++b_iter) {
00264         BL::RenderPass b_pass(*b_iter);
00265 
00266         /* find matching pass type */
00267         PassType pass_type = get_pass_type(b_pass);
00268         int components = b_pass.channels();
00269 
00270         /* copy pixels */
00271         if(buffers->get_pass(pass_type, exposure, sample, components, &pixels[0]))
00272             rna_RenderPass_rect_set(&b_pass.ptr, &pixels[0]);
00273     }
00274 
00275     /* copy combined pass */
00276     if(buffers->get_pass(PASS_COMBINED, exposure, sample, 4, &pixels[0]))
00277         rna_RenderLayer_rect_set(&b_rlay.ptr, &pixels[0]);
00278 
00279     /* tag result as updated */
00280     RE_engine_update_result((RenderEngine*)b_engine.ptr.data, (RenderResult*)b_rr.ptr.data);
00281 }
00282 
00283 void BlenderSession::synchronize()
00284 {
00285     /* on session/scene parameter changes, we recreate session entirely */
00286     SceneParams scene_params = BlenderSync::get_scene_params(b_scene, background);
00287     SessionParams session_params = BlenderSync::get_session_params(b_userpref, b_scene, background);
00288 
00289     if(session->params.modified(session_params) ||
00290        scene->params.modified(scene_params)) {
00291         free_session();
00292         create_session();
00293         session->start();
00294         return;
00295     }
00296 
00297     /* increase samples, but never decrease */
00298     session->set_samples(session_params.samples);
00299     session->set_pause(BlenderSync::get_session_pause(b_scene, background));
00300 
00301     /* copy recalc flags, outside of mutex so we can decide to do the real
00302        synchronization at a later time to not block on running updates */
00303     sync->sync_recalc();
00304 
00305     /* try to acquire mutex. if we don't want to or can't, come back later */
00306     if(!session->ready_to_reset() || !session->scene->mutex.try_lock()) {
00307         tag_update();
00308         return;
00309     }
00310 
00311     /* data and camera synchronize */
00312     sync->sync_data(b_v3d);
00313 
00314     if(b_rv3d)
00315         sync->sync_view(b_v3d, b_rv3d, width, height);
00316     else
00317         sync->sync_camera(b_engine.camera_override(), width, height);
00318 
00319     /* unlock */
00320     session->scene->mutex.unlock();
00321 
00322     /* reset if needed */
00323     if(scene->need_reset()) {
00324         BufferParams buffer_params = BlenderSync::get_buffer_params(b_scene, b_rv3d, width, height);
00325         session->reset(buffer_params, session_params.samples);
00326     }
00327 }
00328 
00329 bool BlenderSession::draw(int w, int h)
00330 {
00331     /* before drawing, we verify camera and viewport size changes, because
00332        we do not get update callbacks for those, we must detect them here */
00333     if(session->ready_to_reset()) {
00334         bool reset = false;
00335 
00336         /* try to acquire mutex. if we can't, come back later */
00337         if(!session->scene->mutex.try_lock()) {
00338             tag_update();
00339         }
00340         else {
00341             /* update camera from 3d view */
00342             bool need_update = scene->camera->need_update;
00343 
00344             sync->sync_view(b_v3d, b_rv3d, w, h);
00345 
00346             if(scene->camera->need_update && !need_update)
00347                 reset = true;
00348 
00349             session->scene->mutex.unlock();
00350         }
00351 
00352         /* if dimensions changed, reset */
00353         if(width != w || height != h) {
00354             width = w;
00355             height = h;
00356             reset = true;
00357         }
00358 
00359         /* reset if requested */
00360         if(reset) {
00361             SessionParams session_params = BlenderSync::get_session_params(b_userpref, b_scene, background);
00362             BufferParams buffer_params = BlenderSync::get_buffer_params(b_scene, b_rv3d, width, height);
00363 
00364             session->reset(buffer_params, session_params.samples);
00365         }
00366     }
00367 
00368     /* update status and progress for 3d view draw */
00369     update_status_progress();
00370 
00371     /* draw */
00372     BufferParams buffer_params = BlenderSync::get_buffer_params(b_scene, b_rv3d, width, height);
00373 
00374     return !session->draw(buffer_params);
00375 }
00376 
00377 void BlenderSession::get_status(string& status, string& substatus)
00378 {
00379     session->progress.get_status(status, substatus);
00380 }
00381 
00382 void BlenderSession::get_progress(float& progress, double& total_time)
00383 {
00384     double sample_time;
00385     int sample;
00386 
00387     session->progress.get_sample(sample, total_time, sample_time);
00388     progress = ((float)sample/(float)session->params.samples);
00389 }
00390 
00391 void BlenderSession::update_status_progress()
00392 {
00393     string timestatus, status, substatus;
00394     float progress;
00395     double total_time;
00396     char time_str[128];
00397 
00398     get_status(status, substatus);
00399     get_progress(progress, total_time);
00400 
00401     BLI_timestr(total_time, time_str);
00402     timestatus = "Elapsed: " + string(time_str) + " | ";
00403 
00404     if(substatus.size() > 0)
00405         status += " | " + substatus;
00406 
00407     if(status != last_status) {
00408         RE_engine_update_stats((RenderEngine*)b_engine.ptr.data, "", (timestatus + status).c_str());
00409         last_status = status;
00410     }
00411     if(progress != last_progress) {
00412         RE_engine_update_progress((RenderEngine*)b_engine.ptr.data, progress);
00413         last_progress = progress;
00414     }
00415 }
00416 
00417 void BlenderSession::tag_update()
00418 {
00419     /* tell blender that we want to get another update callback */
00420     engine_tag_update((RenderEngine*)b_engine.ptr.data);
00421 }
00422 
00423 void BlenderSession::tag_redraw()
00424 {
00425     if(background) {
00426         /* update stats and progress, only for background here because
00427            in 3d view we do it in draw for thread safety reasons */
00428         update_status_progress();
00429 
00430         /* offline render, redraw if timeout passed */
00431         if(time_dt() - last_redraw_time > 1.0f) {
00432             write_render_result();
00433             engine_tag_redraw((RenderEngine*)b_engine.ptr.data);
00434             last_redraw_time = time_dt();
00435         }
00436     }
00437     else {
00438         /* tell blender that we want to redraw */
00439         engine_tag_redraw((RenderEngine*)b_engine.ptr.data);
00440     }
00441 }
00442 
00443 void BlenderSession::test_cancel()
00444 {
00445     /* test if we need to cancel rendering */
00446     if(background)
00447         if(RE_engine_test_break((RenderEngine*)b_engine.ptr.data))
00448             session->progress.set_cancel("Cancelled");
00449 }
